attributes.action: Stop plans for the state funeral of Margeret Thatcher
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: She was the most divisive  post war PM this country has ever had, she robbed from the poor to give to the rich. She started the 80s greed culture.She took 10p back from old age pensions as they had been "paid too much". Her economic policies led to 15% inflation and the collapse of sterling. When she said "jobs saved" she meant jobs lost.I could go on and on. No to a state funeral for Thatcher

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
